statements: SELECT * FROM celebrity_backup
SELECT celebrity_name, backup_date FROM celebrity_backup
SELECT backup_location, celebrity_name, backup_date FROM celebrity_backup
SELECT celebrity_name FROM celebrity_backup WHERE backup_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT celebrity_name, backup_location FROM celebrity_backup WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM celebrity_backup WHERE celebrity_name = 'Tom Hanks';
SELECT celebrity_name, backup_date FROM celebrity_backup WHERE backup_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT id, celebrity_name, backup_date, backup_location FROM celebrity_backup WHERE backup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT celebrity_name FROM celebrity_backup ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT backup_location FROM celebrity_backup;
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, occupation FROM celebrity WHERE occupation = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM celebrity WHERE age IS NOT NULL;
SELECT backup_id, backup_date, details FROM backup_history ORDER BY backup_date ASC, backup_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM celebrity WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, occupation FROM celebrity WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM celebrity ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM celebrity WHERE occupation = 'Singer';
SELECT * FROM backup_history WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM celebrity_info WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, occupation FROM celebrity_info WHERE occupation = 'Actor'
SELECT id, name, occupation FROM celebrity_info WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM backup_history WHERE backup_method = 'Cloud'
SELECT backup_id, backup_date FROM backup_history
SELECT name, age FROM celebrity_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, occupation FROM celebrity_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM backup_history WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT backup_method, COUNT(*) AS total_backups FROM backup_history GROUP BY backup_method HAVING total_backups > 1;
SELECT b.storage_location, bs.storage_capacity FROM backup_storage bs JOIN backup_history b ON bs.storage_id = b.backup_id;
SELECT * FROM celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM celebrities ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT profession, net_worth FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, location_address, contact_person FROM backup_locations;
SELECT * FROM celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY net_worth DESC;
SELECT id, name, profession FROM celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor' AND net_worth > 1000000;
SELECT name, age, profession FROM celebrities ORDER BY age ASC, profession DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE success = TRUE AND backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT file_name, file_size, backup_date FROM backup_files WHERE file_size > 500 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities;
SELECT name, age FROM Celebrities WHERE profession = 'Actor';
SELECT * FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, genre FROM Movies WHERE duration > 120;
SELECT id, name, profession FROM Celebrities WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM Celebrities WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, profession FROM Celebrities WHERE age < 40 AND profession = 'Actor';
SELECT title, genre FROM Movies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, year FROM Awards WHERE event = 'Oscars' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Married' OR relationship_type = 'Engaged';
